titleStmt.title: The Scriptures proved to be the word of God, and the only foundation of faith, and rule for our obedience. Or, A clear conviction of the errours of those that are called Quakers. Who blasphemously affirm that the Scriptures are not the word of God, nor the foundation of faith, nor the only rule for our obedience ... / By Sampson Tounesend, minister of the Gospel, and pastor of S. Austins, and Saviours parish in Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Townsend, Sampson.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for R. Tomlins at the Sun and Bible in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
